TopicTitle: A-7 Lance Close-Air Support - Shock and Awe Video with Rad Music

Articles.Content:
Greetings!

So I was trying for an even more upbeat, bada!@ video than usual. I found this music from a killer artist today, TeknoAXE (check him out on youtube!) and thought it was perfect for showing off my CAS.

This video is of the A-7 Lance, a Close-Air Support. This post is purely for the video and for its (hopeful) merits/critique. I was really just trying to have fun with this (even more-so than with THE BUS, just a different kind ), and it took a lot of time and practice to hit the targets, but gosh it was so damn satisfying! I posted a bunch of technical wahoo, pictures, and a manual in the Spacecraft Exchange as well if that's your thing, otherwise, enjoy the show!

Edited March 31, 2014 by guz667
Haha, thanks! By request, I'll totally do a day one! It might have to wait a couple days, have some family stuff going on the next couple afternoons. But maybe I'll be able to sneak it in anyway!
